title: AGRICULTURE
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Biology/Agricultural Science,

Mathematics and any three (3) of the following:

Geography,

Food and Nutrition,

Economics,

Technical Drawing,

English Language,

Physics,

Chemistry,

Nigerian Language,

Home Economics.

At least 'O' Level credit passes in English Language and Chemistry are compulsory
subjects: Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry and any other Science subjects

title: BANKING OPERATIONS
utme_requirements:
Five (5) credit passes at SSC or its equivalent in English Language (not Literature in English) and Mathematics and any three (3) subjects from the following:

Economics/Commerce, Business Methods, Principles of Accounts, Literature in English, Geography, Office Practice, Government, Biology/ Agricultural Science, Chemistry, Physics, History/Government, Typewriting, Shorthand.
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of Economics, Geography, History, Government, Commerce or Principles of Accounts.

title: COMPUTER HARDWARE ENGINEERING/ TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements: Five (5) credit passes at SSC or its equivalent in Mathematics, English Language and any other three (3) relevant subjects

title: COMPUTER SOFTWARE ENGINEERING TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements: Five (5) credit passes at SSC or its equivalent in Mathematics, English Language and any other three (3) relevant subjects

title: DIGITAL MULTIMEDIA TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements: Five (5) credit passes at SSC or its equivalent in Mathematics, English Language and any other three (3)  relevant subjects
subjects: Any four (4) subjects from Arts/Social Science

title: FILM & TV PRODUCTION
utme_requirements: Five (5) credit passes at SSC or its equivalent in Mathematics, English Language and any other three (3)  from Arts, Science and Social Science subjects
subjects: Any three (3) subjects from Arts/Social Science/Physical Science.

title: NETWORKING & SYSTEM SECURITY
utme_requirements: Five (5) credit passes at SSC or its equivalent, in Mathematics, English Language and any other three (3)  relevant subjects.

title: PARALEGAL STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) credit passes at SSC or its equivalent in Mathematics, English Language and any other three (3) from Arts and Social Science subjects
subjects: Any three (3) subjects from Arts/Social Science/Physical Science.

title: PERFORMING & MEDIA ARTS
utme_requirements: Five (5) credit passes at SSC  or its equivalent in Mathematics, English Language and any other three (3) from Arts and Social Science subjects
subjects: Any three (3) subjects from Arts/Social Science/Physical Science

title: PROFESSIONAL DEVELOPMENT EARLY CHILDHOOD CARE MANAGEMENT
utme_requirements: Five (5) credit passes at SSC  or its equivalent (TC Grade II) in Mathematics, English Language and any other three (3) from Arts and Social Science subjects
subjects: Any three (3) subjects from Arts/Social Science/Physical Science
